pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64bit OS)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) / Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 6th Gen I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Experience the dynamic and exciting arcade soundtrack of Skybolt Zack with this awesome soundtrack!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
